verbs.description: aurora [V: will] vote to get rid of red light cameras aurora residents who and are tired of red light cameras will soon have a chance to vote to have them removed the aurora city council has approved a ballot measure for the november election asking residents whether they should keep the cameras in place or abolish the program light
